node.html: This is a demo entry to display the future functionality of the digital-hub. From summer 2022 to autumn 2023 the ReInHerit Digital-Hub is under pilot phase. The content of the hub will be subsequently added / enhanced during this project phase. Provided resources might get unavailable, changed or adapted during that time.
